text.section: The articles of incorporation need not set forth any of the corporate powers enumerated in this chapter.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 52, effective January 1, 2011. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 341, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 16, effective January 1, 1989; and ch. 224, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1988.
